item.title: A certain new address deposited 2.59 million USDC and went long on XPL with 1x leverage.
item.description: On August 27th, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a newly established wallet deposited 2.59 million USDC into HyperLiquid and initiated a 1x leverage XPL long position.

item.title: Predictive market DeFi Layer-1 protocol Gondor has completed its angel round funding, with participation from Maven 11 and others
item.description: August 27th. According to official channels, the DeFi layer protocol prediction market Gondor has declared the accomplishment of its angel round of financing. The specific amount has not been disclosed yet. Maven 11 took part in this round of financing.It is reported that Gondor's first product, the "Polymarket Position Lending Protocol," is on the verge of being launched.

item.title: Upbit Trading Volume Continues to Decline: ETH, XRP, BTC Lead the Way
item.description: On August 27th, according to CoinGecko data, in the previous 24 hours, the trading volume on Upbit slightly decreased to $2.62 billion, with a decline of 25.7%. Among them, the ETH/KRW trading pair took the lead in the Korean won market with a trading volume share of 16.35%, and the other top five in ranking are: XRP, BTC, CRO, SOL.

item.title: Two Whale Addresses Bought a Total of 358,279 HYPE in the Past 12 Hours, Worth $18.23 Million
item.description: On August 27th, based on the monitoring of LookOnChain, within the past 12 hours, two whales have made purchases of 358,279 HYPE (equivalent to 18.23 million USD). As of the time of writing, HYPE is priced at 50.99 USD, and it has witnessed a 24-hour price increase of 12%.

item.title: Aptos Application and Execution Layer Protocol Panora Completes New Funding Round, Lead Investor Frictionless Capital
item.description: On August 27th, as per official channels, the Aptos application and execution layer protocol Panora announced the accomplishment of a new round of financing, with the specific sum remaining undisclosed.This round of financing was spearheaded by Frictionless Capital and was participated in by Aptos Labs co-founder and CEO avery.apt as well as Aptos Labs founding engineer and DevRel lead greg.apt.

item.title: Survey Results Show One Quarter of UK Adults Would Include Cryptocurrency in Their Retirement Plan
item.description: August 27th. According to Cointelegraph, the latest survey by insurance company Aviva indicates that 27% of UK adults are willing to incorporate cryptocurrency into their retirement investment portfolio. Moreover, 23% are even thinking about withdrawing their existing pensions for crypto investment. Approximately one-fifth of the respondents stated that they already hold or have held cryptocurrency, with the 25 - 34 age group being the most active. Although attracted by the high potential for returns, investors still have concerns about security risks (41%), the lack of regulation (37%), and price volatility (30), among other issues.In May this year, the UK proposed a crypto regulatory framework. Meanwhile, the United States has already permitted 401(k) retirement plans to include cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin. The UK's pension market is valued at $5.12 trillion. If it opens up channels for crypto investment, it may lead to significant inflows of funds into the crypto market.

item.title: A whale withdrew $4.43 million worth of DOGE from Binance, holding a total of 52.9 million DOGE.
item.description: August 27th. Based on Onchain Lens monitoring, a whale has once more withdrawn 20 million DOGE from Binance, with a value of $4.43 million. The whale currently possesses 52.9 million DOGE, which is worth $11.71 million.

item.title: Ark Invest reduced its Coinbase stock by 1952 shares yesterday
item.description: On August 27th, based on the Ark Invest Tracker, Ark Invest sold 1952 shares of Coinbase yesterday. When calculated at a closing price of $308.48 for COIN, the value was approximately $602,000.

item.title: Statistics: BitMine has received a total of 131,736 ETH in the last 12 hours, equivalent to approximately $591 million.
item.description: On August 27th, according to Chain.info, BitMine (BMNR) received 131,736 ETH (equivalent to 5.91 billion USD) within the past 12 hours from three institutional business platform addresses such as BitGo, Galaxy Digital, and FalconX.After purchasing ETH earlier this week, they are now estimated to hold 1,845,000 ETH (with a value of 8.54 billion USD). The average price is approximately $3,868.

item.title: A Whale Accumulated 262.5 WBTC with Leverage, with an Average Price of $110,286
item.description: August 27th. According to Chainalysis, a significant investor used leverage to purchase WBTC. 11 hours ago, this investor withdrew 145 WBTC from Binance to an on-chain address and then deposited it into Aave as collateral. Subsequently, the investor borrowed 13 million USDT and used it to continue purchasing an additional 117.5 WBTC.Currently, they hold 262.5 WBTC ($28.95 million), with a cost basis of $110,286 per WBTC.
